item.description:
A politician (Matt Damon) falls for a dancer (Emily Blunt), but a mysterious organization known as The Adjustment Bureau conspires to keep the them apart. The Adjustment Bureau are the agents of Fate - keeping people on track to their destinies. According to the Bureau, these two don't have a destiny together. But that's not going to keep Matt Damon from trying to thwart the Bureau's plans and find Emily Blunt again.

The movie starts at 7:00 PM at West Boylston Cinema, and it's only $3 on Tuesdays! Let's meet in the lobby at 6:45. Call my cell phone if you need to: 508-981-0455.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting in the lobby. I look like my photo.
item.why: This looks like an interesting movie, and the cinema has $3 Bargain Tuesdays!

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Adjustment Bureau
